raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 DISPLAY OPERATION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics DU Memorized Conﬁgurations

Format Copies Copies/DU1 Copies/Side2 Copies/Flt Deck3

Video 1 2 4

VSD Sub- window4 1 2 4

VSD VWX Overlay 1 1 2

WXR Overlay4 1 2 4

1 Copies per DU is the maximum window for- mats simultaneously displayed in the Display Unit.

2 Copies per side is the maximum window formats that can be simultaneously displayed per side of the Flight Deck.

3 Copies per Flight Deck is the maximum window formats simultaneously displayed in the Flight Deck.

4 Copies shown for overlays are for Dual FMS conﬁgurations with 4 Maps and 2 HSIs per FD. For single FMS, there would be only 2 Map and 2 HSIs per Flight Deck.
